name: Small Basic LitDev Resource File
summary: An SBRES file is a resource file created by LitDev, an extension for the Microsoft Small Basic programming language. It contains binary data used to add resources to a Small Basic program. SBRES files are typically named for the program they are used with. For example, a Small Basic program named ExampleApp.exe may use an SBRES file named ExampleApp.sbres .

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.
